author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

This is a technical PR that allows the GPU support of ONNXRuntime (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/6776) to be easily enabled in CMSSW.

Three options are implemented:

- `no_gpu`: run ONNXRuntime on CPU regardless of the presence of GPUs
- `auto_gpu`: run ONNXRuntime on GPU if available, otherwise run on CPU. The detection of GPU is via CUDA's `cudaGetDeviceCount()`.
- `force_gpu`: run ONNXRuntime on GPU. Throws an error if GPUs are not detected. Intended mostly for debugging/unit tests. 

Example usage:

```c++
  using namespace cms::Ort;
  std::string model_path = edm::FileInPath("PhysicsTools/ONNXRuntime/test/data/model.onnx").fullPath();
  auto session_options = ONNXRuntime::defaultSessionOptions(auto_gpu);
  ONNXRuntime rt(model_path, &session_options);
```

#### PR validation:

Unit tests are updated to cover all three options.
title: Add GPU support for ONNXRuntime
